effect.Name: Quad Wire-Frame (Texture)
effect.description: This shader is a modification of the Quad shader created by Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole).
effect.author: Foxioo and Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole)

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Quad Wire-Frame (Texture) | 1.0 (13.04.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader is a modification of the Quad shader created by Adam Hawker (aka Sketchy / MuddyMole).

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Size
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the thickness of the line.

parameter.name: Scale Deform X
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for converting TexCoord in the shader to actual pixels for scaled objects to maintain aspect ratio. If you have a 32x24 object and a 1280x960 window, the calculation for _ScaleDeformX is 1280 / 32 = 40. (Mainly applicable to Tails7!).

parameter.name: Scale Deform Y
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for converting TexCoord in the shader to actual pixels for scaled objects to maintain aspect ratio. If you have a 32x24 object and a 1280x960 window, the calculation for _ScaleDeformX is 960 / 24 = 40. (Mainly applicable to Tails7!).

parameter.name: Color
parameter.description: This variable specifies what color the line should be.

parameter.name: xA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: yA (-X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point A (Top left point)

parameter.name: xB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: X of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: yB (+X -Y)
parameter.description: Y of point B (Top right point)

parameter.name: xC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: yC (+X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point C (Bottom right point)

parameter.name: xD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: X of point D (Bottom left point)

parameter.name: yD (-X +Y)
parameter.description: Y of point D (Bottom left point)
